text: Web Components built to be used. They are lightweight, have a simple API and are easy to extend and compose.
bullets: **Testable:** Hundreds of test-cases makes sure the library is stable.
**Easy-to-use:** But with a simple and understandable API.
**Accessible:** All components has been build with accessibility in mind.
**Single-responsibility:** Each component does one thing really well. This makes them really easy to extend and compose.
elements: Trigger actions by clicking or tapping buttons.
